Privacy Policy

Welcome to my portfolio website. We highly value your privacy and are dedicated to safeguarding your personal information. This Privacy Policy Notice explains how we collect, use, disclose, and secure your data when you use our website and contact us through the provided contact form, powered by the third-party service Formspree. When you interact with our website and utilize the contact form, which is facilitated by Formspree, we collect the following information: your name, email address, and the content of your message or inquiry. We employ the information collected to respond to your inquiries promptly and furnish you with the necessary information or services you seek. Additionally, we may use this data to enhance our website and services based on your valuable feedback and interaction patterns. Rest assured, your information is handled with the utmost care and is never used for marketing purposes without your explicit consent. We do not share your personal information with any third parties, except in cases where it is mandated by applicable laws or in response to a legitimate legal request. Formspree, as a third-party service, assists us in collecting and processing your data solely for the purpose of facilitating communication. Please note that Formspree has its own privacy policy that governs its data collection and usage practices. You can review Formspree's privacy policy by visiting Formspree Privacy Policy . While we have chosen Formspree as a trusted service provider, we encourage you to review their privacy policy to understand how they handle your data. Your data security is of paramount importance to us. While we implement robust security measures to protect your information, it is essential to acknowledge that no method of transmitting data over the internet is entirely impervious to threats. Thus, we cannot guarantee the absolute security of data transmitted to us. This Privacy Policy Notice may be updated periodically to reflect changes in our practices, as well as for operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. Any significant revisions will be prominently disclosed on this page
